# DotZero AI Tools

> MCP servers and skills for DotZero manufacturing execution systems (MES)

## Quick Start

1. Install: `npx @dotzero.ai/setup`
2. Restart Claude Code
3. Authenticate: `auth_login(email, password, tenant_id)`
4. Use tools: `workorder_list()`, `product_list()`, etc.

## Available MCP Tools (98)

### Authentication (2)
- `auth_login` - Login with email/password/tenant_id
- `auth_status` - Check authentication status

### Work Orders (7)
- `workorder_list` - List with filters (status, date range, rush)
- `workorder_get` - Get by ID/UUID
- `workorder_create` - Create new work order
- `workorder_update` - Update existing
- `workorder_delete` - Delete by UUID
- `workorder_details` - Full details with product and operations
- `workorder_count` - Get total count

### Products (6)
- `product_list` - List with filters (name, number, category)
- `product_get` - Get by UUID
- `product_create` - Create new product
- `product_update` - Update existing
- `product_details` - Full details
- `product_copy` - Copy product

### Workers (5)
- `worker_list` - List with filters
- `worker_get` - Get by UUID
- `worker_create` - Create worker
- `worker_update` - Update worker
- `worker_delete` - Delete worker

### Operation History (7)
- `operation_history_list` - List with filters
- `operation_history_get` - Get by UUID
- `operation_history_create` - Create record
- `operation_history_create_many` - Batch create
- `operation_history_delete` - Delete record
- `operation_history_by_workorder` - Get by work order
- `operation_history_timeline` - Timeline view

### Reports & Analytics (5)
- `workorder_report` - Work order report
- `report_update` - Update report
- `weekly_report` - Weekly summary
- `analytics_operations` - Operation analytics
- `analytics_workorder_report` - Work order analytics

### Routes (7)
- `route_list`, `route_get`, `route_create`, `route_update`, `route_delete`
- `route_by_product` - Routes for a product
- `route_copy` - Copy route

### Operations (5)
- `operation_list`, `operation_get`, `operation_create`, `operation_update`, `operation_delete`

### Route Operations (6)
- `route_operation_list`, `route_operation_get`, `route_operation_create`
- `route_operation_update`, `route_operation_delete`, `route_operation_by_route`

### Devices (5)
- `device_list`, `device_get`, `device_create`, `device_update`, `device_delete`

### Stations (6)
- `station_list`, `station_get`, `station_create`, `station_update`, `station_delete`
- `station_device_list`

### Quality (12)
- Defect Reasons: `defect_reason_list`, `defect_reason_create`, `defect_reason_update`, `defect_reason_delete`
- Defect Categories: `defect_reason_category_list`, `defect_reason_category_get`, `defect_reason_category_create`, `defect_reason_category_update`
- Op Product BOM: `op_product_bom_list`, `op_product_bom_create`, `op_product_bom_update`, `op_product_bom_delete`

### Abnormal (9)
- History: `abnormal_history_list`, `abnormal_history_get`, `abnormal_history_create`, `abnormal_history_update`, `abnormal_history_by_workorder`
- Config: `abnormal_category_list`, `abnormal_category_create`, `abnormal_state_list`, `abnormal_state_create`

### Warehouse & WMS (15)
- Warehouses: `warehouse_list`, `warehouse_get`, `warehouse_create`, `warehouse_update`
- Storage: `warehouse_storage_list`, `warehouse_storage_get`, `warehouse_storage_create`, `warehouse_storage_update`
- Product Storage: `product_storage_list`, `product_storage_get`, `product_storage_by_product`
- WMS: `wms_check_inventory`, `wms_query_product_storage`, `wms_query_storage_history`, `wms_minimal_stock_count`

## Work Order Status

| Value | Status |
|-------|--------|
| 1 | Not Started |
| 2 | In Progress |
| 3 | Completed |
| 4 | Incomplete |

## Environment Variables

| Variable | Required | Description |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| WORK_ORDER_API_URL | Yes | Work Order API base URL |
| USER_API_URL | No | Auth API URL (has default) |

## npm Packages

- `@dotzero.ai/auth-mcp` - Authentication MCP server
- `@dotzero.ai/work-order-mcp` - Work Order MCP server
- `@dotzero.ai/setup` - One-command setup CLI

## Source

- Repository: https://github.com/dotzero-ai/dz-ai
- Website: https://dotzero.app
